attributes.action: Put more money into Mental Health Issues
attributes.additional_details: I have a daughter who has been suffering mental health issues for some time....We have been through 'Social Services' help for the last few years and to be honest....They have made things much worse for us as the do not have a clue as to what the whole problem is....They just have to deal with the person concerned and what 'they' want to do about it....Including who can be present at any meeting.........How is that helpful or understanding as they only get one side of a story...Answer that
attributes.background: This country states that mental health is A MAJOR issue in this country....Yet David Cameron has CUT funding to the services needed by those affected, which also puts more pressure on the family's involved...Not just financially.With out help and support family's break down making matters much worse
